sentences.english: In 2000, she studied the graduate courses at Xinjing Theological Seminary.
sentences.chinese: 2000年在信经神学院读函授研究生，肄业。

sentences.english: The development of modern distance education is seriously challenging the traditional correspondence education.
sentences.chinese: 现代远程教育的发展使传统函授教育受到严重挑战。

sentences.english: In 1951 the Department of Correspondence was established by Northeast experimental schools.
sentences.chinese: 1951年东北实验学校设立了函授部。

sentences.english: Many different kinds of people have graduated from correspondence schools.
sentences.chinese: 许多不同类型的人已经从函授学校毕业。

sentences.english: she took a french course in a correspondence school.
sentences.chinese: 她在函授黉舍修法语课程。

sentences.english: She took a French course in a correspondence school.
sentences.chinese: 她在函授学校修法语课程。

sentences.english: Marketing department is a new organizational subsection in ESHKO Kazakhstan.
sentences.chinese: 市场开发部是哈萨克斯坦函授学校的一个新的部门。

sentences.english: He was employed to teach in Shanghai Fine Arts School, and later worked concurrently as director of the second Correspondence department.
sentences.chinese: 受聘执教于上海图画美术院，后兼任函授乙部主任。

sentences.english: Correspondence teacher is in the leading status and playing a key role in the correspondence education.
sentences.chinese: 函授教师在函授教育中处于主导地位，起着关键作用。

sentences.english: Correspondence teacher is in the leading status and playing a key role in the correspondence education.
sentences.chinese: 函授教师在函授教育中处于主导地位，起着关键作用。

sentences.english: Teaching quality is the lifeblood of the party school correspondence education.
sentences.chinese: 教学质量是党校函授教育的生命线。

sentences.english: The decisions of the judging panel are final and no correspondence will be entered into.
sentences.chinese: 该决定的，评审团是终局的，没有函授，将进入。

sentences.english: His English was taught by correspondence.
sentences.chinese: 他的英语是靠函授学习的。

definition: to transfer (from production to other duties)/to take leave (for study or other job)/to dispose of property/to transfer assets (to avoid liability)
adult education, abbr. for 成人教育[cheng2 ren2 jiao4 yu4]
abbr. for 函授大學|函授大学[han2 shou4 da4 xue2], open university
evening college (abbr. for 夜大學|夜大学[ye4 da4 xue2])
partly released from productive labor/partly released from one's regular work
college for people who attend after work
